content: The norm of the press having special access to the President was based on the norm of the press being held to some level of objectivity in reporting news to the public. But now that the mainstream press has announced itself to be openly biased not just in their opinion pieces but in news reporting, and basically a propaganda arm of the Democratic party, there is no legitimate reason for them to expect any special access. They are the ones violating norms while at the same time expecting others to abide by them. They picked a side and they lost. The mistake was theirs.
